title: Przeradz Mały
data: Przeradz Mały [ˈpʂɛrat͡s ˈmawɨ] is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lutocin, within Żuromin County, Masovian Voivodeship, in east-central Poland.[1] It lies approximately 8 kilometres (5 mi) south-west of Żuromin and 122 km (76 mi) north-west of Warsaw. This Żuromin County location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
